title: How to Have Shiny Nails Without Using Nail Polish

steps.title: Be sure to apply the oil in a thin layer.
steps.content: Be sure to apply the oil in a thin layer. Cuticle oil moisturizes your nails and promotes their overall health.

steps.title: Smooth out ridges and other imperfections.
steps.content: Smooth out ridges and other imperfections.

steps.title: This helps smooth out the buffer marks.
steps.content: This helps smooth out the buffer marks. It also helps remove the stained surface layer if you have yellowed nails.

steps.title: Your nails should appear to be very shiny.
steps.content: Your nails should appear to be very shiny.

steps.title: All of your nails should look beautiful and shiny now.
steps.content: All of your nails should look beautiful and shiny now.
